attributes.action: reduce the number of Ministers thereby improving efficiency and reducing cost.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Ministerial “payroll” should be limited to a Prime Minister, a Second Lord of the Treasury or Chancellor, four Secretaries of State and twenty five Ministers. This total of thirty one accords with best organisation practice and is less than ten percent of a majority in the House of Commons.

Ministers’ remuneration should be set for a parliament in party manifestos at each general election.
